description: This Python script sets up an agent with an OpenAI chat model to process an audio file and generate a text response. It loads a sample MP3 file, configures the agent, and requests a response about the audio.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with models and media inputs.

classes.name: Audio
classes.description: Represents an audio media object with a file path and format.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response generated by the agent based on the provided prompt and media.
